title: “I Make Some Pretty Bada*s NPC’s” - With Aimee Meester of DnD Disability
itunes:title: “I Make Some Pretty Bada*s NPC’s” - With Aimee Meester of DnD Disability
description:
This week the Halflings get to talk to the incredible Aimee Meester. We talk all about their work with DnD Disability, covering some of the amazing creations they have made to make the game more accessible, using DnD as a rebound & creating things that reflect you and people like you!

Find Aimee

DnD Disability


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
